name: Assisterr AI
description: Assisterr uniquely combines tokenized Specialized language models (AI agents), real-time monetization, decentralized ownership, and agent-to-agent interoperability into a no-code, scalable platform.Assisterr is a decentralized no-code platform and infrastructure stack that empowers individuals and organizations to build, tokenize, and monetize AI agents powered by modular Specialized Language Models (SLMs). It acts as a permissionless agent economy and marketplace â€” where creators can launch AI agents, contributors can earn ownership through data or validation, and users can interact with intelligent, domain-specific solutions across consumer and enterprise verticals.
